Mince

  • Code
  • Open Source
  • Side Project

Flexible Object Data Mapping Library

For Ruby, supports in memory hash db, MongoDB, and Amazonâ€™s DynamoDB

Easy to write support for other databases

Decouple your models from your database.

Inspired by Uncle Bob's 2012 Ruby Midwest Keynote

Maturity

Survives prototyping to medium size applications

Not yet recommended for enterprise size applications

  • Main Project
  • Frameworks

  • Asynchrony

Develop mobile solutions for corporate needs

Integrate easily with existing legacy data sources

Distribute applications across an enterprise with control in security for mobile devices.

I lead the team that began developing this project, I have since moved on to leading a new project. Ionic Mobile is a product owned and developed by Asynchrony.

Fear In Programming

  • Presentation

This presentation is about fear, and how fear can effect how I make decisions in my career as a programmer. My hope is to challenge you, and that you would challenge me with ideas on how we can conquer fear, how we can make our projects better, our teams stronger, our industry more valuable, and encourage each other to become better people.

Ever experienced the pain of a God class? I have some theories on how you can, among many things, conquer even the God class.

Freelance Code

These are my latest freelance projects.

Photography by Betty Elaine

  • Wedding Photography
  • Wedding Photographer

Built in May of 2011, but receives frequent re-alignment of design in order to evolve as Betty's business evolves. I developed this website using middleman so that I can develop quickly and still provide fast load times with a static website and provided business solutions, like google analytics, email submissions usingAmazon's SES, a blog that matches a similar style, and custom email using her business's domain name.

DMD Brands - Weight Gurus

DMD Brands hired me to help kickoff their internal software team. I provided a framework to help them understand how to develop software professionally for their products in a quality way. I interviewed developers, and gave recommendations, and I developed software with them to get them started.

Weight Gurus is an iphone and android application with a backend server, I used phonegap with html5, css, and javascript, for the mobile delivery strategy, tested with jasmine, and cucumber. And used ruby with Amazon's DynamoDb for the server.

Least Of These Charities

Custom wordpress theme which included custom post types in order to present the organization's products differently.

Least of these charities is a non-profit organization that needed a way to expose their products to buyers online.

Bondstor

Bondstor was an idea that a young entrepreneur had to improve his industry. We worked closely together to establish a functional prototype, and developed a beta version to get approved for use and support by his employer.
